problem:
Alice, Bob, and Claire are on the same team in a soccer match. At the start of the match, they are each assigned to a position: Alice is playing cheerleader, Bob is playing right winger, and Claire is playing goalkeeper.
As the game progresses, pairs of players occasionally swap positions. First, Alice and Claire trade positions. Then, Bob and Alice trade positions. Finally, Claire and Bob trade positions. At the end of the match, Alice is playing
Options:
(A) cheerleader
(B) right winger
(C) goalkeeper
